verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, I thank You for the life invested in me:
Now I'm ready to be seed in Your hand.
Sow me where You want me, make me fruitful;
I give You all I have and all I am.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, let me be a servant
With this one life I live;
Like Jesus, blessed Servant,
My life I want to give.
You have given so much to me:
Now I pray, just let me be
A servant, a servant to Thee.
